sections.heading: Alienage; conditions.No person is disqualified to take as an heir because he or she or a person through whom he or she claims is or has been an alien except as provided in section 4-107 and under the Foreign-owned Real Estate National Security Act
sections.text: SourceLaws 1974, LB 354, ยง 34, UPC ยง 2-112;Laws 2024
